body:
SELECT
    sqltext.TEXT,
    req.session_id,
    req.blocking_session_id,
    req.wait_type,
    req.wait_time,
    req.last_wait_type,
    req.wait_resource,
    req.open_transaction_count,
    req.transaction_id,
    req.total_elapsed_time,blocksession.program_name
FROM
    sys.dm_exec_requests req
left join sys.dm_exec_sessions blocksession ON req.blocking_session_id=blocksession.session_id
CROSS APPLY
    sys.dm_exec_sql_text(req.sql_handle) AS sqltext
